Plot: During a night of 1983 with full lunar eclipse, Samantha Hughes takes a babysitting job surrounded by mysterious circumstances before she finds out her client's terrifying secret.
Title: The House of the Devil
Actors: Jocelin Donahue, Tom Noonan, Mary Woronov, Greta Gerwig
tomatoConsensus: Though its underlying themes are familiar, House of the Devil effectively sheds the loud and gory cliches of contemporary horror to deliver a tense, slowly building throwback to the fright flicks of decades past.
